values: 影子；阴影；暗影；背光处；隐蔽处；幽暗处；跟踪者；伴随者；追随者；（政治上的）在野党成员；（尤指在野党的）影子内阁成员
遮蔽；在…上投下（或覆盖）阴影；投下阴影；盯梢；跟踪；尾随；暗中监视

synonym.mean: 阴影；影子；幽灵；庇护；隐蔽处

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 成荫的；阴暗的；名声不好的
遮蔽住；使阴暗（shade的过去分词）
朦胧的；有阴影的；虚无的；暗黑的
遮蔽（shadow的过去式及过去分词）
底纹；遮蔽；[印刷] 明暗法；[印刷] 描影法；留下阴影
暧昧；隐蔽；有阴影的情形

word_mean_info__list.difference: 常指光线被物体挡住所产生的阴影，影子，有明显的轮廓。
指阳光被遮挡后出现的荫凉处，如树荫等，无一定的轮廓或边界。

word_group.phrase: without a shadow of a doubt

word_group.brief_definition: 影子拳击；太极拳；空拳练习

bilingual.source: Now, the shadow had swallowed half of the Sun.
bilingual.target: 现在，阴影吞噬了半个太阳。

bilingual.source: Now, the shadow had swallowed three-quarters of the Sun.
bilingual.target: 现在，阴影吞噬了四分之三的太阳。

bilingual.source: The cat hid in the shadow of the sofa.
There is a big shadow under the tree.
bilingual.target: 树下有一个很大的阴影。

bilingual.source: He saw his own shadow on the wall.
bilingual.target: 他在墙上看到了自己的阴影。

bilingual.source: The tree cast a long shadow on the ground.
bilingual.target: 树在地上投下了长长的阴影。

bilingual.source: She noticed a shadow moving behind her.
bilingual.target: 她注意到身后有一个阴影在移动。

bilingual.source: After the sun set, the shadow became longer.
bilingual.target: 太阳落山后，阴影变得更长了。

bilingual.source: The shadow parts in this painting are very delicate.
bilingual.target: 这幅画中的阴影部分非常细腻。

list.abstract: Shadow（原名Josh Davis，别名DJ Shadow），出生于美国加州，美国男歌手，代表作品有《Psyence Fiction》、《The Private Place》等。
shadow为韩国女子组合f(x)演唱歌曲. 不同于上一张迷你二辑的精悍，这一张正规二辑《pink tape》更为饱满，继2012年6月《Electric Shock》之后时隔13个月的新专辑，让我们的耳朵听到了更多属于这五个人的独居特色的故事。

yingyinNormal.en: I remember a shadow, living in the shade of your greatness.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我心里只有阴影，我一直活在你的阴影里。

yingyinNormal.en: Every planet orbiting a luminous object is casting a shadow out into space.
yingyinNormal.zh: 绕着恒星运行的每一个行星，都会向太空投射阴影。

yingyinNormal.en: Their shadow is spreading across the galaxy. We must face them. Fight them. All of us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们的阴影笼罩着整个银河系，我们必须面对他们，和他们战斗，我们所有人。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe Samaritan's recycling puzzles. Unlikely, Mr. Reese. The coordinates are in the Shadow Map.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许是撒马利亚人重开谜题了。不太可能，里瑟先生，那个坐标在阴影地图中。

yingyinNormal.en: The machine can't talk to me as much as she used to, but she did want you to have this, a gift, a shadow map of New York.
yingyinNormal.zh: 机器跟我交流不能像以前一样多了，不过她想把这个送给你，一份礼物，纽约阴影地图。

yingyinNormal.en: Their tools were climbing hook and shadow. These demons were trained by the Old Man in the Mountain. They were Hashshashin.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们借助的是飞爪和阴影，这些恶魔是深山中的长者一手训练出来的，他们是哈沙辛人。

yingyinNormal.en: I find it increasingly difficult to do my job when the greatest obstacle in my path casts a looming shadow over everything I try to do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我发现我做我的工作越来越难，因为我的路上有一块巨大的绊脚石，我做每件事的时候都伴随着若隐若现的阴影

yingyinNormal.en: No other term is relevant. I think we have been operating under the shadow of terror for too long. For the sake of the American people, we need to act now. What's the timetable, General?
yingyinNormal.zh: 短期没错就够了。我想我们已经在恐怖主义的阴影下忍受太久了。为了美国人民，我们必须采取坚决行动。预计需要多少时间，将军？

yingyinNormal.en: I always worried that Alex winning all those awards would bother Luke, and looks like it finally did. Can't be easy growing up in the shadow of a superstar sister. Look at Mitchell.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一直担心艾丽克斯拿了那么多奖会刺激到卢克，结果好像真的刺激到了。在一个超级明星姐姐的阴影下长大，实属不易。看看米奇尔就知道了。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, Shaw's power is that he's a shadow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 肖的能力之强就好比他是个影子。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, how do you play the shadow game? Oh, how do you play the shadow game?
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么是影子游戏？什么是影子游戏？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, whose shadow is that? That's the biggest shadow ever. It must be a giant. It's not a giant. The shadow is being made by a cloud. Wow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢，这是谁的影子？我觉得这是世界上最大的影子了。我想这个一定是巨人的影子。哈哈哈，这不是巨人的影子。而是由天上的云彩投下的。哇！

yingyinNormal.en: Silly George. That's not the ball. that's just its shadow. Look. When the ball moves, its shadow moves as well. You've got a shadow too, George.
yingyinNormal.zh: 糊涂的乔治，那可不是球。那只是球的影子而已。你看！球移动的时候，影子也跟着移动。你也有影子啊，乔治。

yingyinNormal.en: You see? My shadow is still underneath me. Run faster. Even if I run faster, my shadow keeps up with me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们看？我的影子一直都在我脚下。再跑快一点！就算是我再跑得快一点，我的影子也还是跟着我。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy, your shadow is too big. It's slowing you down. It's not that, Emily. Your shadow always stays with you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，你的影子太大了，是它让你跑不快的。不是那样的，艾米丽。你的影子会永远跟在你的身边。

yingyinNormal.en: You need to use a scooter. Suzy is trying to ride away from her shadow. See. But your shadow is still there. Oh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们得骑滑板车才甩得开。呜！苏西想要滑着滑板车甩掉她的影子。看到了吗！可是你的影子还在那里啊。噢！

yingyinNormal.en: George is trying to walk away from his shadow. You can't walk away from your shadow. You need to run away from it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治想要试图甩开他的影子。你这么走可没办法甩掉你的影子。你得跑起来才能甩的掉它。

yingyinNormal.en: Why? When something gets in the way of the sun, it makes a shadow, like this. Oh. I have the biggest shadow, because I'm the biggest.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？任何东西只要在太阳底下，就会投下影子，像是这样。噢！我有一个最大的影子，因为我的个头最大。

yingyinNormal.en: It is bed time. I'm a bit sad that my shadow's gone away. Don't be sad, Peppa. Electric light can make shadows, and we can make shadow puppets.
yingyinNormal.zh: 睡觉的时间到了。我有一点难过因为我的影子不见了。别难过，佩奇。电灯也能让影子出现，我们还能玩手影游戏。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, we used to drive each other crazy playing the shadow game.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们还玩影子游戏让对方发狂。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 给…投下阴影；给…蒙上阴影；使阴郁；使不快；比…更显眼；显得比…更重要；比…留下更深刻的印象；比…更成功；使相形见绌
v. 预示；是（未来事件）的征兆
n. 阴影；背光处；影子；形影不离的伴侣；追随者；悲伤；丝毫；痕迹；茫然

word_family.mean: n. 荫；阴凉处；深浅浓淡；灯罩；鬼；幽灵；阴暗处；默默无闻；细微差别；略微

exam_freq_info.chinese: (without a shadow of a doubt) 毫无疑问

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: without a shadow of a doubt

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 给…投下阴影；给…蒙上阴影；使阴郁；使不快；比…更显眼；显得比…更重要；比…留下更深刻的印象；比…更成功；使相形见绌

examination_example.sentence: Parents should teach children to develop their own values instead of becoming anyone's <highlight>shadow</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母应该教会孩子树立自己的价值观，而不是成为任何人的影子。

sense_info_list.zh: (without a shadow of a doubt) 毫无疑问

examination_example.sentence: The simplest thing isn't clear to the brightest man if he believes that he knows, without a <highlight>shadow</highlight> of a doubt, what is laid before him.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果最聪明的人认为他毫无疑问地知道摆在他面前的是什么，那么最简单的事情对他来说也是不清楚的。

examination_example.sentence: The original gloiy of an unlit nigh, dark enough for the planet Venus to throw <highlight>shadow</highlight> on Earth, is wholly beyond our experience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最初的昏暗无光的夜晚——黑暗得足以让金星在地球上投下阴影——完全超出了我们的体验。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 背阴的；多荫的；成荫的；不正当的；靠不住的；可疑的
n. 阴影；背光处；影子；形影不离的伴侣；追随者；悲伤；丝毫；痕迹；茫然

word_family.mean: n. 荫；阴凉处；深浅浓淡；灯罩；鬼；幽灵；阴暗处；默默无闻；细微差别；略微

examination_example.sentence: She was more interested in cartoon series than <highlight>shadow</highlight> puppetry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 比起皮影戏，她对卡通系列更感兴趣。

examination_example.sentence: In recent years, she has made <highlight>shadow</highlight> puppets based on some cartoon series and given a live streaming performance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 近年来，她根据一些卡通系列制作了皮影戏，并进行了现场流媒体表演。

examination_example.sentence: It takes about 3,000 carves to make a <highlight>shadow</highlight> puppet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 制作一个皮影大约需要3000个雕刻。
